title: Mordekaiser offers 0.0 counterplay
body:
Buy QSS? If you're playing a mage or an ap assassin if you buy QSS you're actually losing a lot of stats.
It is ok when champs like malz can ult you, but a tanky champ like mordekaiser who isn't focused in teamfights can ult you and totally destroy your team, how on earth is that even fair?
revert mordekaiser, it feels like it's a totally different champion now.
also revert akali and irelia

replies.body:
He has limited range, telegraphed skillshots, his sustain has a long cooldown where you can punish him, and his ult can be cleansed. 

He's got like, every form of counterplay in the game.

QSS gives movement speed and a cleanse can save you from more than mordes ult.

kiting him possibly as well?
Kill him? Like he also is out of the fight meaning his team loses a front line. Like how is there not counter play?

When you realize that him ulting doesn't change your gameplay formula, and if you can't fight him in ult you probably can't fight him out of it neither. 

That's a skill problem, not a champ problem lol

From what I have played against his counterplay is walking away from him and QSS and his pull is slow as fuck and Q as well, honestly, he reminds me of Illaoi but with the ability to stop people from running

{{item:3157}} {{item:3140}} 
dashes, cc, {{summoner:4}} over a wall it has plenty of counterplay
He's slow, his pull is slow, all his moves are skillshots besides ult
